body.name: QiMH Industrial Floor Lamp for Living Room, Farmhouse Metal Standing Lamp, Modern Tall Lamp Light for Bedroom Office Minimalist Home Decor(E26 Socket, Foot Switch), Brown
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 53 mins
features: Minimalist Design: The floor lamps with contemporary metal finishes without complex adds, showcasing simplicity as the ultimate sophistication. With fashion metallic color, modern clean flow lines apperance, and exposed bulb (bulb not included), the lamps add natural, comfortable, and delightful ambiance to your home. Minimalist design takes up the least space for you to place the living room lamps in many places to bring elegant designs to your modern home decoration.

Create Your Own Style: This living room lamp leaves space for you to DIY, you are the designer for your room. The floor lamp for bedroom comes with a built-in E26 standard socket, according to your home style and your own taste, design your stylish lamps by choosing different shapes of E26 base light bulbs (Max.60W), and change the bulb to change the look. The modern floor lamp is compatible with a variety of LED or CFL light bulbs (bulbs are not included).

Made to Last and Safety: This whole stand-up lamp is made of metal, with a strong metal pole and a 9-inch weighted metal base that will firmly hold the standing light. This farmhouse floor lamp provides good stability from falling, passing Safety Standard Test and 8 Degree Tilt Test makes the tall floor lamp wobble-free and safe to have around children and pets, providing stability and durability for daily use.

Convenient Pedal Switch: The black floor lamp adopts a pedal switch that allows you to easily tap the lamp on or off with your foot without bending over. The 6-ft cord allows you to place the standing lamps in any place you want. This lamp for living room is 65 inches tall. It's the perfect height to sit next to your sofa or favorite chair. The standing light lamp can be used as a bedside reading light, living room couch lamp, floor reading lamp, or office standing lamp.

Easy to Assemble & Use: The floor lamps for living room is easy to assemble without tools, all you need to do is to screw all the parts of the lamp pole together following the instruction. And install your favorite light bulb style, then plug in and switch. If you have any questions, please let us. We are devoted to providing great after-sales service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Qimh industrial floor lamp is designed with minimalist and made of premium metal with an E26 socket that allows you to create your own stylish lamps with different light bulbs. If you are looking for an industrial-look metal lamp, this minimalist floor lamp is the ideal choice you can't miss out!

Durable - Whole Metal Lamp with Foot Switch The vintage floor lamp is made of metal and comes with a stable base, matte black pole and a convenient footswitch. You can easily find your preferred E26 light bulbs to create different looks for this industrial lamp.

Stability - Heavy Metal Base With the weighted metal base, you will be able to place this bedroom floor lamp on any type of floor, including long-pile carpets. The industrial floor lamp will firmly stand upright on the floor. You will not need to worry about the tilt and slide issues.

Simplicity - Easy to Use This is a simple stand lamp with a 6-foot power cord and a pedal foot switch. A long power cord allows you to place the beautiful light in the right position with minimal limitations. Just step on the foot switch to turn on/off the light. Things can not be easier!

Bulb Requirement: 1 X E26 Medium Base（Max.60 W） Socket: E26 Standard Base Voltage: 110-120V Power Switch: Foot Pedal Switch - On or Off Total Height: 65 inches Power Cord: 6 feet Note: Bulbs are sold separately, not included in the package.

Create Your Own Style Minimalist design takes up the least space to place the standing light anywhere you need. Industrial style for you to create your own style lamp with different types of light bulbs. You may use the standing floor lamp as a bedside reading light, living room, couch lamp or office standing lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This lamp is perfect for a room that doesn’t need a ton of light. I bought almost identical bulbs as in the photo, and it’s very nice looking. This lamp does not come with a bulb. I bought two Edison bulbs just like that for $10 for two at Walmart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job, beautifully!
reviews.reviewText: Yes it’s basic but it’s basically the most simple decor that gets the most compliments

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: This lamp looks just like the picture. It doesn't come with the vintage bulb but I found several different styles at local hardware store. Was easy to assemble, overall very happy with this purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this floor lamp
reviews.reviewText: I love the look of this floor lamp. I had something like this one previously but it wasn't as tall. This is a little taller and I really like how the bulb is exposed. I made sure to get the vintage filament type bulb. This is the type of bulb in product description and it goes well. I loved it so much, I ordered another so I had two of them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So I bought one of those lightbulb cameras for my balcony but it didn't fit in the light sconce. So I bought this lamp stand and it works perfectly! It sits on my balcony and captures people walking by and neighborhood pets. I am very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s nice but it looks like it’s missing something and feels awkward in my space

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's perfect for the space I needed it in

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A not too bad floor standing lamp that needs a bulb post purchase.
reviews.reviewText: Buried in the product description it states that the bulb in not included. Had the product sold and shipped as it was pictured with the antique looking bulb it might have been a 5 star product. But then again, everyone's taste is so varied maybe it was best to leave it out. Anywho... The lamp comes in several parts and once assembled the pole has a some minor bends and turns preventing it from being perfectly straight due to all the screw joints. That can be corrected with some adjustments, mostly.The lamp uses a traditional AC wall plug so hip hip hooray its not a USB plug. The bulb placement is within vicinity of line of sight so it can be very blinding depending on the bulb you use. I bought the "Feit Electric Vintage Exposed Filament Amber Glass LED G25 with a Medium E26 Base Light Bulb - 40W Equivalent" and it's still way too bright for my use. I will need to go even lower, dare I say 5 watts to not see spots.Despite my critical tone here, the floor standing lamp is more than serviceable in certain situations and I can recommend it for that fact that it does exactly what it's advertised to and you really can't ask for more than that. I do like the foot switch. That's not built into a enough products! If you plan to sit underneath this lamp for reading or for projects it may be the ideal choice for that. It wasn't till I had a bare naked light bulb shining in my face that I realized it needs some shade. The lamp is cheap by most comparisons so get it.
